ess-beta-metadata.label: Gross value added per hour worked
ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Estimated value of goods and services produced per hour worked
ess-beta-metadata.longDescription: This indicator shows the measure of business productivity (estimate of the volume of goods and services produced) in Â£ per hour worked (official statistics in development), in the UK, for 2004 to 2023.
